name: Roman Candell
skill: Deals 2393/2933 DMG to 3 enemies (ranged priority), with a moderate chance of inflicting Burn.
ability: Significantly increases DMG dealt at the start of the final wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a firework which sprays colorful sparks into the air. In the summer, this spirit travels near and far to make sure firework displays don't fizzle and flop. Roman's hair is a vertical mane of flames that acts as an emotional barometer. The more excited he becomes, the more his mane seehthes, its color growing deeper shades of red. As a result, his hair is constantly alive with activity when watchng firework displays, and explodes towards the heaves while in combat. In fact, some say that no living person has seen his hair in its normal, relaxed state...begging the question if it really can be called an emotional barometer when he only seems to have one mood: excited.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 19/07/17- 09/08/2017
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 06/08/2017 - 09/08/2017
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases Skill DMG of all allies by 33% during the "The Great Fireworks Showdown" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 19/07/17- 09/08/2017

main: "Come on! Let's go out with a bang!"
skill: "Don't blink, you'll miss the grand finale!"
summon: "Hey! You give it a try, too!"
